description: Presidential Secretariat - Appointed Mr. J.J. Rathnasiri, Mr. D.G.M.V. Hapuarchchi, Mr. T.P.G.N. de Alwis & Mr. Esala Weerakoon as the Secretaries to the Ministries of Public Administration & Management, Post, Postal Services & Muslim Religious Affairs, Home Affairs & Foreign Affairs respectively w.e.f. 01.08.2016
